abilities.name: Devo Flash
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Espeon ex from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may choose 1 Evolved Pokémon on your opponent's Bench, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from that Pokémon, and put it back into his or her hand.

attacks.name: Snap Tail
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Psyloop
attacks.effect: Does 60 damage plus 30 more damage for each Trainer card your opponent has in play.
